Citing imbalanced_spdf
======================

If you are using **imbalanced_spdf** in your scientific research,
please cite the following paper:

    Rahul Goswami, Aindrila Garai, Payel Sadhukhan, Tanujit Chakraboty, Palash Ghosh : Shape-Penalized Decision Forests for imbalanced_spdf Data Classification ,Preprint Sumbitted to IEEE Access, 2025

BibTeX entry::

    @misc{a place holder for citation of the paper
      }
